# Kokimoki SDK

> The Kokimoki SDK is a comprehensive development toolkit for building real-time collaborative game applications

**ALWAYS** follow instructions defined in [`Kokimoki SDK Documentation`](../../node_modules/@kokimoki/app/dist/llms.txt) to effectively utilize the Kokimoki SDK features, including client management, state stores, media uploads, server time synchronization, leaderboard DB, and AI integration capabilities
